item.title: Inventory Management Website
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Inventory and product management website. This project was developed for the “Codo a Codo - Django” course together with Omar. It was made with Django Framework and PostgreSQL. Check out the GitHub repository and the website. The website allows the stock management of a warehouse. There are 3 levels of users: Employee (Level 1, mostly read permissions). Supervisor (Level 2, read and write permissions). Administrator (Level 3, read and write permissions and access to Django’s admin panel).
